SEARCH
Module io.avaje.config
Package io.avaje.config

Interface ModificationEvent.Builder

Enclosing interface:
ModificationEvent
public static interface ModificationEvent.Builder
Build and publish modifications to the configuration. 


   configuration.eventBuilder("MyChanges")
     .put("someKey", "val0")
     .put("someOther.key", "42")
     .remove("foo")
     .publish();
See Also:
  • Configuration.eventBuilder(String)
  • Configuration.onChange(Consumer, String...)

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    publish()
    Publish the changes.

    Set a property value.

    Set all the properties from the map.
    ModificationEvent.Builder
    remove(String key)
    Remove a property from the configuration.

  • Method Details

    • put

      ModificationEvent.Builder put(String key, String value)
      Set a property value.
      Parameters:
      key - The property key
      value - The new value of the property

    • putAll

      ModificationEvent.Builder putAll(Map<String,?> map)
      Set all the properties from the map.

    • remove

      ModificationEvent.Builder remove(String key)
      Remove a property from the configuration.

    • publish

      void publish()
      Publish the changes. Listeners registered via Configuration.onChange(Consumer, String...) will be notified on the changes.
